Proposed Change:
Reformat codelist so that activity and organisation level documents are more clearly defined. 

Deprecate the `Document Category (category) <https://iatistandard.org/en/iati-standard/203/codelists/documentcategory-category/>`_ codelist.
Rationale: Currently, A codes are for activity level documents and B codes are for organisation level documents. This is not clear to data users or publishers.
The existing codelist is taken from the DAC/CRS transaction classification. Reporting organisations have become more varied since IATIs inception, and struggle to map to internal codes.

Assumed to be deprecated via `iati-activity/location/gazetteer-entry <https://iatistandard.org/en/iati-standard/104/activity-standard/iati-activities/iati-activity/location/gazetteer-entry/>`_ deprecation in v1.04.

Assumed to be deprecated via `iati-activity/location/coordinates <https://iatistandard.org/en/iati-standard/104/activity-standard/iati-activities/iati-activity/location/coordinates/>`_ deprecation in v1.04.
To ensure that data users and reporting organisations have a shared understanding of the codelist.

Proposed Change: Replace the values 1-2 and 2-1 with 12 and 21.
Rationale: Microsoft Excel interprets 1-2 and 2-1 as dates, which makes it hard to work with IATI data that uses this codelist in spreadsheets.
To ensure that data users and reporting organisations have a shared understanding of the codelist.

Proposed Change: Map the codelist to the OECD DAC codes.
Rationale: To allow easy mapping between systems.
Source:
Initial `discussions <https://www.iaticonnect.org/discussion/differences-between-ngo-organisation-type-codes>`_  in 2016.

Requested by IATI Community Member, Sept 2025

Rationale: To ensure that data users and reporting organisations have a shared understanding of the codelist.
This element is required but has one value.

Proposed Change:
Remove little used transaction types.

Form a new codelist to provide this extra "@detail".
Rationale: Rare transaction types are often excluded from data use queries, so the data is not used.
